page.title: 10Housing in East Beverley
page.content: The housing in the area is mostly post-war. The houses on Swinemoor Estate are mainly semi-detached private houses and terraced council houses which are in blocks of four. They are made mainly of brick. There are also other materials, tiles for the roof, metal for the window frames, wood for the doors,glass for the windows,cement to hold the bricks in place and steel for the gutters. They are mainly early post-war but some low-rise flats and semi-detached private houses have been built in the last 3-15 years. Many houses do not have chimney pots because they have central heating using gas or electriity. Some houses without central heating burn coal in an open grate,they have chimney pots.
